sys_openapi_operation.name: Return linked assets.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Return linked assets.","fOperationId":"getLinkedAssets","fDescription":"This API returns a list of assets that are linked to the specified asset provided as a parameter (sourceId).\nThe list will include the following information about the linked assets: the name, id, type and properties of the icon of the asset; the type and id of the link; id and name of the used capability.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assetLinks","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson3265066106","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"responseapplicationjson3265066106","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Linked Asset","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have \u0027read\u0027 permission for the asset type.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"sourceId","fDescription":"The ID of the source asset","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"sourceId5686314261","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
